Database Administrator (OM-DTA-001): Administers databases and/or data management systems that allow for the secure storage, query, protection, and utilization of data. Click to view the Master KSA List

column2: Knowledge of cybersecurity and privacy principles.
Knowledge of cyber threats and vulnerabilities.
Knowledge of specific operational impacts of cybersecurity lapses.

Knowledge of data backup and recovery.
Knowledge of data mining and data warehousing principles.

Knowledge of database management systems, query languages, table relationships, and views.
